text:
#COVID19 #Vaccine hoarding will only prolong the ordeal and delay Africa's recovery, it's deeply unjust to most vulnerable #Africans, says @MoetiTshidi @WHOAFRO.  
Last week President @CyrilRamaphosa received #SouthAfrica’s 1st consignment of the vaccine. #VaccineforSouthAfrica https://t.co/2qHCvHXpKa
